com.st.st25sdk.type2

Class Type2Tag

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.st25sdk.NFCTag
      • com.st.st25sdk.type2.Type2Tag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheInterface, CCFileInterface, NdefCommandInterface, Type2CommandInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    STType2Tag

    public class Type2Tag
extends NFCTag
implements CCFileInterface, NdefCommandInterface, Type2CommandInterface, CacheInterface
    Defines required methods to handle a NFC Forum Type2 tag

    • Nested Class Summary

      Modifier and Type Class and Description

      Lists existing Type2 file types

      Parse bytes buffer and extract all discovered TLV as a TLV list
      java.util.List<ControlTlv> parseMemoryForTlv()
      Parse type2 tag memory from address 0x10 and extract all discovered TLV as a TLV list Do not jump Null TLV if present at the start of T2T Area Do not jump Null TLV if present at start of block (may be used for NDEF message padding)

      Command to read data from type2 tag
      byte[] readBlocks(int firstBlockAddress, int sizeInBlocks)
      Read several blocks on Type2 tag

      Read a number of Bytes at a given address In case of read error, the STException will contain the data that we have been able to read.

      Sector Select process used to address physical memory bigger than 1KB (1024 Bytes) in type2 tag

      Write several blocks on Type2 tag
      void writeBytes(int byteAddress, byte[] data)
      Write some Bytes at a given address WARNING: After this write, the cache may not be aligned anymore with tag's memory content so it is recommended to invalidate the cache.

      Write the CCFile to the tag

                       byte[] data)
                throws STException

      • writeNdefMessage

        public void writeNdefMessage(NDEFMsg msg)
                      throws STException
        Write a NDEF message with specified flags. Parse type2 Tag memory looking for lock control and reserved area TLV to jump over
        Specified by:
        writeNdefMessage in interface NdefCommandInterface
        Specified by:
        writeNdefMessage in class NFCTag
        Parameters:
        msg - NDEF Message to write, must not be null
        Throws:
        STException - - STExceptionCode.INVALID_DATA_PARAM if msg parameter is null - STExceptionCode.INVALID_CCFILE if the CCFile does not follow the ISO rules - STExceptionCode.INVALID_NDEF_DATA if the NDEF data fields are not formatted correctly - STExceptionCode.NDEF_MESSAGE_TOO_BIG if the message length does not fit in the tag's memory

      • readNdefMessage

        public NDEFMsg readNdefMessage()
                        throws STException
        Read the current NdefMessage on type2 tag Parse type2 Tag memory looking for lock control and reserved area TLV to jump over
        Specified by:
        readNdefMessage in interface NdefCommandInterface
        Specified by:
        readNdefMessage in class NFCTag
        Returns:
        NDEF Message read from the tag
        Throws:
        STException

      • computeLockControlAndReservedArea

        public java.util.List<int[]> computeLockControlAndReservedArea(java.util.List<ControlTlv> listOfTlv)
                                                        throws STException
        Create list of Lock and Reserved areas TLV sorted by address
        Parameters:
        listOfTlv - list of TLVs
        Returns:
        list of arrays of integer with item [0]=address of the TLV area and item [1]=size in bytes of the TLV Area
        Throws:
        STException

      • findNdefMsgStartAddress

        public int findNdefMsgStartAddress()
                            throws STException
        Parse Type2 Tag memory looking for TLV and NDEF start addresses (NDEF TLV or end of TLV areas)
        Returns:
        start address of NDEF message
        Throws:
        STException

      • findNdefMsgStartAddress

        public int findNdefMsgStartAddress(java.util.List<ControlTlv> listOfTlv)
                            throws STException
        Parse Type2 Tag memory looking for NDEF Msg start address
        Parameters:
        listOfTlv - list of TLV found in Type2 tag memory
        Returns:
        start address of NDEF message
        Throws:
        STException

      • decodeTlvFromTag

        public ControlTlv decodeTlvFromTag(int byteAddress)
                            throws STException
        Read memory and decode TLV structure Read 5 bytes to be able to decode all TLVs (Null, Terminator, Memory Control, Lock Control, NDEF, Proprietary)
        Parameters:
        byteAddress - address to read
        Returns:
        TLV structure
        Throws:
        STException

      • computeTlvSize

        public int computeTlvSize(int byteAddress)
                   throws STException
        Read memory and decode TLV structure in order to get TLV size Read 5 bytes to be able to decode all TLVs (Null, Terminator, Memory Control, Lock Control, NDEF, Proprietary)
        Parameters:
        byteAddress - address to read tag
        Returns:
        size of the TLV structure if any
        Throws:
        STException

      • parseBufferForTlvList

        public java.util.List<ControlTlv> parseBufferForTlvList(byte[] buffer)
                                                 throws STException
        Parse bytes buffer and extract all discovered TLV as a TLV list
        Parameters:
        buffer - array of bytes
        Returns:
        list of TLV
        Throws:
        STException

      • parseBufferForTlvList

        public java.util.List<ControlTlv> parseBufferForTlvList(byte[] buffer,
                                                        int offsetAddress)
                                                 throws STException
        Parse bytes buffer and extract all discovered TLV as a TLV list
        Parameters:
        buffer - array of bytes
        offsetAddress - address of the first byte to start parsing
        Returns:
        list of TLV
        Throws:
        STException

      • parseMemoryForTlv

        public java.util.List<ControlTlv> parseMemoryForTlv()
                                             throws STException
        Parse type2 tag memory from address 0x10 and extract all discovered TLV as a TLV list Do not jump Null TLV if present at the start of T2T Area Do not jump Null TLV if present at start of block (may be used for NDEF message padding)
        Returns:
        list of TLV
        Throws:
        STException
